content: quote: Originally posted by mikeyR8: quote: Originally posted by ArtMarsh: quote: Originally posted by sargeant_green: It morphed. This strain is AH1N1... The "A" means nothing more than it is the Type A virus. H1N1 indicates the virus sub-type I have only seen it once during the time the Kansas couple was found to be Swine Flu positive... and the news reported it as the 9th mutation (version) A(9)H1N1 Art, no mention of it becoming pandemic. Hope it dies off here. Sorry to have been more or less AWOL over the weekend. Our flu season is over with... so this variant isn't going to bother us much. However... for ALL points South of the equator... the Flu season is just starting. So this bug now has 6 months to change itself... and it certainly will. And then... the odds are it is going to come back up North and pay us all a encore performance. I am hoping for the unimproved version myself. Whether it does or doesn't come back... the Vaccine folks are going to make a forth flue type vaccine this year. That is a given. It will be far too late for the southern half of the planet... but should start hitting our markets late October... November. Far as I am concerned... the governments did right by us. Slow down the spread and stop if they could the transmission of the virus. With less of it out there in the wild... the less chance of an early mutation before our medical community is ready for it. We can all think of this as an FTX or PM... Your pick. Either way... it needed to be done
